data.text: Ao me nkurɔfoɔ, montie me nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Mɛkasa wɔ abɛbuo mu,
nneɛma a yɛate na yɛahunu;
Yɛremfa nkame wɔn mma;
Ɔyɛɛ ahyɛdeɛ maa Yakob
sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, nkyirimma bɛsua
Afei wɔde wɔn ho bɛto Onyankopɔn so,
Wɔrenyɛ sɛ wɔn nananom,
Ɛwom sɛ na Efraim mmarima kurakura agyan,
Wɔanni Onyankopɔn apam no so
Wɔn werɛ firii deɛ wayɛ,
Ɔyɛɛ anwanwadeɛ wɔ wɔn nananom anim
Ɔkyɛɛ ɛpo mu na ɔde wɔn faa mu.
Ɔde omununkum dii wɔn anim awia
Ɔpaee ɔbotan mu wɔ ɛserɛ so,
Ɔmaa asutire firii abotan mu
Nanso, wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne tiaa no,
Wɔboapa sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛeɛ;
Wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn sɛ,
Ɔde adeɛ bɔɔ ɔbotan mu no, nsuo to firi mu baeɛ,
Ɛberɛ a Awurade tee deɛ wɔreka no, ne bo fuu yie;
ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔnni Onyankopɔn mu gyidie
Nanso, ɔkasa kyerɛɛ ɔsoro ɔhyɛ so;
Ɔtɔɔ mana firi soro maa nnipa no sɛ wonni,
Nnipa dii abɔfoɔ aduane;
Ɔmaa apueeɛ mframa bɔ firii sorosoro,
Ɔtoo ɛnam sɛ mfuturo guu wɔn so,
Ɔma wɔbaa fam kɔɔ wɔn atenaeɛ,
Wɔdidi maa aduane no boroo wɔn so
Nanso ansa na wɔbɛfiri aduane a wɔhwehwɛeɛ no ho,
Onyankopɔn abufuo sɔree wɔn so;
Yeinom nyinaa akyi, wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne;
Enti, ɔtwaa wɔn nna so te sɛ ahuro
Ɛberɛ biara a Onyankopɔn bɛkum wɔn no, wɔhwehwɛɛ no,
Wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ wɔn botan,
Nanso, wɔde wɔn ano bɛdaadaa no,
wɔn akoma anni no nokorɛ,
Nanso na ɔyɛ ahummɔborɔ;
Ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ ɔhonam ara kwa,
Mpɛn ahe na wɔansɔre antia no wɔ ɛserɛ no so hɔ,
Wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛeɛ ɛberɛ biara;
Wɔn werɛ firii ne tumi no,
ɛda a ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nwanwasoɔ wɔ Misraim no
Ɔmaa wɔn nsubɔntene danee mogya;
Ɔmaa nwansenadɔm baa wɔn so bɛhaa wɔn
Ɔmaa mmɛbɛ bɛdii wɔn mfuo so aduane
Ɔde asukɔtweaa sɛee wɔn bobe
Ɔde sukyerɛmma kumm wɔn anantwie
Ɔhwiee nʼabufuhyeɛ guu wɔn so,
Ɔbɔɔ ɛkwan maa nʼabufuo;
Ɔkunkumm Misraimfoɔ mmakan nyinaa,
Nanso ɔyii ne nkurɔfoɔ firii mu sɛ nnwankuo;
Ɔdii wɔn anim dwoodwoo, enti wɔansuro;
Sei na ɔyɛ de wɔn baa nʼasase kronkron no ahyeɛ so,
Ɔpamoo amanaman a wɔwɔ wɔn anim no
Nanso wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛeɛ
Wɔyɛɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom, wɔanni nokorɛ na wɔannya gyidie,
Wɔde wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea hyɛɛ no abufuo
Onyankopɔn tee wɔn nka no, ne bo fuiɛ;
Ɔgyaa nʼatenaeɛ a ɛwɔ Silo no hɔ
Ɔde Apam Adaka a ɛyɛ ne tumi no kɔɔ nnommumfa mu,
Ɔde ne nkurɔfoɔ maa akofena;
Egya hyee wɔn mmeranteɛ kumm wɔn,
Wɔn asɔfoɔ wuwuu akofena ano,
Afei Awurade sɔree sɛdeɛ ɔfiri nna mu no,
Ɔbobɔɔ nʼatamfoɔ ma wɔdwane kɔɔ wɔn akyi;
Afei ɔpoo Yosef ntomadan no,
Na mmom, ɔfaa Yuda abusuakuo no,
Ɔsii ne kronkronbea te sɛ sorɔnsorɔmmea,
Ɔyii ne ɔsomfoɔ Dawid;
firii nnwan akyiridie, na ɔde no baeɛ
Na Dawid de akoma pa hwɛɛ wɔn so
